Creep: Ah! Now here's some collaboration! However, you do not realize
what =
you are dealing with. Accusing me of something I did not do
willingly, well=
, honey, that only makes me angry. And angry you don't
want me to be. Now, =
do you want to block my way out, or what?

She was still in control of hers=
elf, but also very cold in her tone.
It was as if there was a storm brewing=
 in the room.
